text: Kya iman laney walon ke liye abhi woh waqt nahin aaya ke unke dil Allah ke zikr se pighlein aur uske nazil karda haqq ke aagey jhukein aur woh un logon ki tarah na ho jayein jinhein pehle kitaab di gayi thi, phir ek lambi muddat unpar guzar gayi to unke dil sakht ho gaye aur aaj unmein se aksar fasiq banay huey hain
